item.title: The first webpage with Hugo
item.description: Creating a personal protfolio web page was on my list for 2021, after a first attempt using Google Pages - nice but very limited - and a second attempt using Wordpress - which never came out of testing and fiddling around - this is how I’ll move on. Creating a static web page using Hugo. Why? Well, why, obvious - a place to share with you services that I do offer and give you a place to find me.
